title: Are therre plans to build a McDonalds Restaurant in Hampstead?  If yes, is it going at the Hoover Road and HWY. 17 intersection?  Thanks!
text:
Unfortunately we can't answer speculative questions about retail
development at MyReporter.com. If such a development is announced, it
will be reported in the StarNews and at StarNewsOnline.com.



Here's the latest answer we had concerning development at that
intersection: http://www.myreporter.com/?p=3152
